text:
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) is up Thursday morning, with the stock gaining 1.28% in pre-market trading to 621.46. 


NVDA's short-term technical score of 98 indicates that the stock has traded more bullishly over the last month than 98% of stocks on the market. In the Semiconductors industry, which ranks 50 out of 146 industries, the stock ranks higher than 99% of stocks.

NVIDIA Corp has risen 25.66% over the past month, closing at $495.22 on December 28. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $475.69 and as high as $603.31. NVDA has an average analyst recommendation of Strong Buy. The company has an average price target of $662.54.





 NVDA has an Overall Score of 74. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!
See Full NVDA Report



NVIDIA Corp has a Long-Term Technical rank of 94. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the upper half of stocks with 6% of the market scoring higher. In the Semiconductors industry which is number 51 by this metric, NVDA ranks better than 51% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in NVDA:


-NVIDIA Corp is set to release earnings on 2024-02-28. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $7.59.


-We do not have a set dividend date for NVIDIA Corp at this time.
